gear.name: bxh-xcede-tools-qa
gear.label: BXH-XCEDE-TOOLS: fMRI QA (v1.11.14)
gear.description: Use BXH/XCEDE Tools to perform QA (quality assurance) calculations and produce images, graphs, and/or XML data as output. fmriqa_phantomqa.pl and fmriqa_generate.pl produce an HTML report with various QA measures. fmriqa_phantomqa.pl was designed for fMRI images of the BIRN stability phantom, and fmriqa_generate.pl has been used for human fMRI data.
gear.author: Syam Gadde <gadde@biac.duke.edu>

fmri_input.description: fMRI input file for bxh-xcede-tools-qa. This can be either a DICOM archive ('.dicom.zip'), or a folder of DICOM files, or an enhanced DICOM image (gzipped or not, e.g., 'IM0001.gz', 'IM0001'), or a NIfTI file.
